plugin.comment: While represented as an enum, it is actually an index to the "HUD Shaders" block in CHGD

Things to note about them: -Only 1 condition needs to match per flags for the game to count it. -Fields named with "Weapon" only resolve on HUDs referenced by weapons. -Fields named with [Special] mean the widget is always visible by default, but play a specific animation if a match occurs. -Fields named with [Brief] mean the widget is always invisible by default, but play a specific animation if a match occurs, then becomes invisible again. -Every other field should behave as an on/off switch for whether or not the widget should be drawn.

bit.name: Offset Sprite Index By Biped Type
Offset Sprite Index By Range Input
